page.title: 12LIFE IN OUR VILLAGE
page.content: Strangely the children in the community play very few traditional games. Unlike children in town and city schools who have quite a number of skipping rhymes,children in this area have none. This may well be due to the fact that we have so very few people move into the area. Most of the children have parents who have lived in this locality for a considerable time. Those who have moved into the area have come from places not too far afield and tend to have come from places similiar to this environment. A Maypole Dance was held annually some years ago but is now no longer held possibly due to the influence of T.V. or peoples reluctance to become involved in carrying on traditions. The school forms a very important part of the holding the community together. Without it,the village would die.
